revised_title: An Investigation into the Peripheral Distribution of Fibres in the Posterior Roots of Spinal Nerves
tldr: This study examines the peripheral distribution of fibers in the posterior roots of spinal nerves, focusing on the cranial and cervico-brachial nerve roots. The author investigates the skin and motor distribution of these nerves, as well as the segmental scheme of innervation in the limbs. The research also explores spinal reflex action and its implications for understanding the nervous system.
